message: Let's start fair. Take a small share now, we can negotiate further if you decline.
You're being too generous, I'll take more now
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a bigger share to make it worthwhile. Let's split it more evenly this time.
You're still not giving me enough, I'll take more this time
Let's split it down the middle this time.  We're losing a lot of money with each round, so it's in both of our best interests to reach an agreement now.
